title: Ep: 010 - Tracie Reed of Dextrous Creative
description: In this episode of Architecture, Design & Photography, we sit down with Architect Tracie Reed of Dextrous Creative and Danielle Devine, Editor at Maine Home & Design. Our conversation centers around Tracie's background in master planning, architecture, public relations, political organizing and fundraising. We touch upon the challenges of working as a female architect and how to navigate that in today's environment.
author: info@trentbell.com (Trent Bell)
